title: Ansible Inventory
description: Ansible Inventory for the script inventory plugin

hosts.description: list of hosts that are part of this group

vars.description: Variables to assign to hosts that are part of this group

^\\w$.description: Vars for this hosts in this group

children.description: list of groups that are children of this group, their hosts will be added to this group

_meta.description: Key that avoids calling the script per host

hostvars.description: Each key is a hostname and the value is a dictionary of the variables for that host
